newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egypt central bank offers 500 mln pound repo.
newsitem.headline: Egypt central bank offers 500 mln pound repo.

text.p: Egypt's central bank offered bankers on Tuesday a 500 million pound ($147 million) repurchase deal valid for two weeks, private sector bankers said.
They said the central bank was asking banks to borrow against their treasury bills to inject liquidity in the market.

The repurchase rate will be decided by the bank that offers the highest borrowing rate. On November 6, the central bank offered a similar repo for 500 million pounds. Bankers said public sector banks covered most of that deal.
